thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Wednesday, 10 Jan 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: Current rates support Polish economy, MPC reiterates

author: Reuters Editorial
title: Current rates support Polish economy, MPC reiterates
text:
WARSAW, Jan 10 (Reuters) - Current level of interest rates remains beneficial for the Polish economic growth, the Monetary Policy Council reiterated on Wednesday after it decided to keep the cost of money unchanged at 1.5 percent.
The MPC said, however, that the gross domestic productâ€™s dynamics may slow down a little bit in coming quarters after a robust growth in the second half of 2017.
Reporting by Pawel Sobczak; Writing by Marcin Goclowski; Editing by Lidia Kelly
Our Standards: The Thomson Reuters Trust Principles.
